bibl.title: Ostracologica
bibl.note: 1. The 'lost' Bodleian ostraca from Elkab: O. Bodl. [O. Tait Préaux] 2583-2589. - 2. An ostracon from the Memnonia in Copenhagen: O. Carlsberg Inv. AEIN 833. 29 May & 1 December 62. - 3. O. Berl., Hunt, Tait and some trifles: O. Brüssel-Berlin 21; 43; 62. - 4. O. Deissmann and O. Heidelberg. Edition of O. Sydney Nicholson Mus. Inv. NM36.82 = ex-O. Deiss. [O. Coll. privées: O. Deissmann Inv.] 87. 15 October 76. - 5. Abbreviations, ghost taxes, 'and others'. - 6. Various names, etc. - 7. Abbreviated trifles.
bibl.seg: 142.4 O. Carlsberg Inv. AEIN 833 O. Sydney Nicholson Mus. Inv. NM36.82 = ex-O. Coll. privées: O. Deissmann Inv. 87 145.4 O. Brüssel-Berlin 21; 43; 62 O. Heid. O. Tait Préaux 2583; 2584; 2585; 2586; 2587; 2588; 2589
